description: Ngomba kumenya neza ibyo ku muhanda
title: Abahungu bakunda kuba bahagaze ku muhanda
content:
*Buri munsi abakobwa bahura n’abashobora kubagirira nabi aho batuye. Bashobora guterwa ubwoba bari ku ishuri cyangwa bagasekwa cyangwa bagakorwaho n'abantu batazi bari mu isoko cyangwa muri bisi. Iyi ni inkuru y'umukobwa umwe.*

Nitwa Faith. Nari mu nzira ngana mu rugo mvuye kuvoma. Bwari bumaze kwira kandi narindi njyenyine. Imbere yanjye gato nabonye itsinda ry’abahungu batatu bari mu kigero cy'ubugimbi bahagaze hafi y’akabari. Narinzi neza ko bashobora kunkururira ibibazo.  Ariko sinahagaze. Sinashakaga ko bamenya ko mfite ubwoba. Ubwo mba nambutse umuhanda kugira ngo mbahunge. Icyo gihe ntibyari bikinshobokeye ko nasubira aho mvuye.
Ariko bari bari kundeba banantegereje.  Nabo bambuka umuhanda batangira kunkurikira.  Umutima wanjye wateraga vuba. Nari mfite ubwoba bwinshi. Batangira kunsifura banampamagara mu izina. Bansaba ko twajyana mu kabari. 
Nta wundi muntu wari ukiri ku muhanda. Nta muntu wari uri hafi ku buryo namwitabaza. Natangiye kwihuta. Maze umwe muri bo amfata ukuboko anturutse inyuma. 
Nahiye ubwoba. Mba ndamwishikuje ni uko ndiruka. Nkikata ni uko mbona iduka ryari rigifunguye. Nirukanse amasigamana ni uko ninjiramo. Nkimara kwinjira muri iryo duka, numvishe nduhutse. Sinari njyenyine kuko narindi kumwe na nyir'iduka. Ni uko ahamagara musaza wanjye, aza kunshaka. 
Mubonye ndamubwira nti: “Ntabara ntabara.” “Hariya hanze hari abahungu bari bari kunyirukankaho.” Ariko n'ubundi bari bamaze kwiruka, bagiye. Bakimwumva bahita birukanka.
Sinzi iyo bamfata ibyo bari kunkorera, ariko icyo nzi cyo ni uko nari nahiye ubwoba pee!!  Ubutaha, nzashaka indi nzira yo kunyuramo ntashye cyangwa njye nshaka n'inshuti yo kumperekeza. Iyo nza kuba ndi kumwe n’inshuti yanjye, nta kibazo nari kugira.
